document_data.name: The Shakes
document_data.mainbody: The '''shakes''', also known as '''seizure''', was a [[disease]] that caused involuntary movements and spasms.
document_data.Acquisition: The disease was contagious. It spread via contact with an infected individual, and the incubation period was a mere one day.
document_data.Effects:
The shakes caused the diseased person's body to shake with uncontrollable fits, tremors, and twitches, which was accompanied by a loss of agility. The disease made it difficult to execute tasks requiring finesse or reflexes. As the disease progressed, it could lead to reduced mobility and ultimately to paralysis.

A healthy immune system could fight off the disease in as little as two days. Magically inflicted versions of the disease could last for seven days.
document_data.History:
Unwary explorers in [[Mulmaster]] ran the risk of contracting the shakes in [[Mulmaster/Sewers|the sewers]]. The disease could also be found in the [[Underdark]].

The shakes was one of many illnesses that could be afflicted by the ''[[contagion]]'' spell. By the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a [[spell]] called ''[[contagious fog]]'' had been developed in the Underdark that caused victims of it to be infected with the shakes without any incubation period.
